## üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ Ïã§Ìñâ

### `1. clone repository`

```
git clone https://github.com/GuRaBang/analog-clock.git
```

### `2. install packages`

```
npm i
```

### `3. run code`

```
npm start
```
